blocks.subject: Xmas card from Seattle
text: I too enjoyed our talk last night ( I'm always interested in other
viewpoints, it is only by examining them that we challenge our own).
The Happy Hour tonight is at Teala's on West Dallas.  My recommendation is
that you plan on arriving at 7:00 or later.  Hopefully by that time my old
manager will have had enough to drink he won't mind all these other people on
his tab.
I must admit, the job just keeps sounding better and better.
P.S. Thanks for the compliment...that's a quality I like being associated
with.

blocks.subject: Re: Red Meat
text: yo  there...good talk last night.
There is something i appriciate abuot you which is your willingness to put
yourself on the line...I find that to be a quality.
Anyway, I might be living this week end, though i would come back next
friday, but then i would go to NY for that weekend...Ben's BBQ
Yeha i've got two days of meeting in  NY and then somwhere down south with my
new boss.
traveling all week...loving this already.
Also i just filled out a American Express coportate card app..(VP and higher
are priviledge to that, keep it a secret)
I love this job...
What is the plan tonight, what is the party about...
let me know
